video_prompt: A fair-skinned woman, seated, subtly shifts her gaze leftward. Her dark hair, part cascading, part pulled back with a delicate hairpiece, catches and reflects light. Her lips subtly part, revealing a hint of teeth in a warm expression. A shimmering satin dress, with gold leaf embroidery, flows around her. A lace sash drapes and shifts. Her right hand moves to her thigh; her left arm extends onto an ornate wooden table. The background subtly blurs and changes with soft, shifting light.
image_prompt: Professional portrait of a serene, fair-skinned woman in her early 20s, seated full-length, eye-level, looking slightly left. She has long, dark brown hair with auburn highlights, partially pulled back with a three-pronged hairpiece. Her face features subtle makeup, almond brown eyes with long lashes, and soft pink, slightly parted lips. She wears a shimmering strapless light pink/rose satin dress with gold leaf embroidery on the bust, and a flowing pink lace sash draped from her right shoulder. Her right hand rests on her thigh, while her left arm extends onto an ornate dark brown wooden table with concentric circle details. Soft, warm indoor lighting illuminates the scene, highlighting textures and creating a harmonious composition with a subtly blurred background featuring a dark wooden cabinet and floor.
refined_video_prompt: A woman's gaze subtly shifts leftward. Her hair catches and reflects light as her lips subtly part, revealing teeth in a warm expression. A shimmering dress flows around her; a sash drapes and shifts. Her right hand moves to her thigh, while her left arm extends. The background subtly blurs and changes with soft, shifting light.
